name: IdleRampage
description: A 2D incremental idle/active hybrid game where you manage builders, defeat robot waves, and prestige for permanent upgrades.

store.shortDescription: Build, battle robots, and prestige in this addictive idle game!
store.fullDescription:
Idle Rampage is an exciting incremental game where strategy meets action!

FEATURES:
- Manage 30+ builders across production and combat buildings
- Battle through waves of increasingly powerful robots
- Tap to deal damage or let auto-damage do the work
- Prestige to earn Blueprints and unlock permanent upgrades
- Offline progression keeps you earning while away
- Simple yet deep strategic gameplay

STRATEGY:
Assign your builders wisely between Scrap Yards for income and Turret Bays for combat damage. Upgrade buildings to increase efficiency and push to higher waves for better rewards.

PRESTIGE:
Reach wave 10 to unlock prestige. Reset your progress to earn Blueprints - a permanent currency used to purchase powerful upgrades that persist forever.

Start your rampage today!
